div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 66 Myonia, near Delphi, Phocis, 1899 (717) Burial: 335-330 B.C. (T) Contents: 12+ AR Delphi: 11+ Amphictionic st. Athens: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Athens 5 (4 Delphi, 1 Athens); Warren 3 (758-60); Boston 2 (Brett 977-8); Ward 1 (475A); Berlin Svoronos, JIAN 5899, pp. 297-9, illus. Regling, Klio 1906, p. 505, note 2 Raven, NC 1950, pp. 10-11 The bronze coins of Noe 717 do not belong to the hd.
